docs.text: Welcome to your MDEF documentation site! ¶ This is a template for documenting your Master in Design for Emergent Futures journey. Getting started ¶ Edit this file ( docs/index.md ) to customize your homepage Add your content in the docs/ directory Configure your site in mkdocs.yml Navigation ¶ The navigation is configured in mkdocs.yml . You can: Add new pages to the navigation Reorder existing pages Create nested navigation structures Styling ¶ You can customize the appearance of your site by: Editing docs/stylesheets/extra.css for custom CSS Modifying the theme configuration in mkdocs.yml Adding custom HTML templates in custom_theme/ Content ¶ Your content goes in the docs/ directory. You can organize it however you like, but remember to update the navigation in mkdocs.yml to reflect your structure. Happy documenting! 🚀
docs.title: Welcome to your MDEF documentation site!
